SizeLetter	XS	XS	S	S	M	M

US	2	4	6	8	10	12
UK	6	8	10	12	14	16
China	155/76A	160/80A	165/84A	165/88A	170/92A	170/96A
Chest	76	80	84	88	92	96
Waist	60	64	68	72	76	80
Hips	84	88	92	96	100	104
InsideLeg	79	79	79	79	79	79

SizeLetter	L	L	XL	XL	2XL	2XL	3XL	3XL
Europe	44	46	48	50	52	54	56	58
US	14	16	18	20	22	24	26	28
